languages.text: "Это был последний очаг сопротивления. Бунт подавлен, Лорд-капитан. Блюстители начинают прочесывание отсеков, офицеры формируют новые ремонтные бригады на замену инфернусам. Ключевые системы корабля стабилизированы, а ваш трон освобожден. Тысячи подданных династии ждут ваших приказов — займите капитанский трон и повелевайте. Слава династии фон Валанциус!"
languages.translation_comment:
мастер дисциплины
комплит обж4
конец диалога, даем игроку полутаться, открываем выход в покои. при тыке прошло n дней, игрок на уже починенном мостике

мастер дисциплины
комплит обж4
конец диалога, даем игроку полутаться, открываем выход в покои. при тыке прошло n дней, игрок на уже починенном мостике

languages.text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. Thousands of dynasty subjects are waiting for your orders, so all that remains is for you to take the captain's throne and affirm your dominion. All hail House von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "Это был последний очаг сопротивления. Бунт подавлен, Лорд-капитан. Блюстители начинают прочесывание отсеков, офицеры формируют новые ремонтные бригады на замену инфернусам. Ключевые системы корабля стабилизированы, а ваш трон освобожден. Тысячи подданных династии ждут ваших приказов — займите капитанский трон и повелевайте. Слава династии фон Валанциус!"

languages.text: «Ese era el último foco de resistencia. El motín ha sido sofocado, Lord Capitán. El personal de seguridad está realizando un barrido de los compartimentos y los oficiales están entrenando nuevos equipos de reparación para sustituir a los Infernus. Los sistemas esenciales de la nave han sido estabilizados y su trono ha sido liberado. Miles de súbditos esperan sus órdenes, tan solo resta que ocupe usted el trono del capitán y demuestre su autoridad. ¡Larga vida a la casa von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「あれが最後のひと絞りの抵抗で、反乱は鎮圧されました、ロード・キャプテン。エンフォーサーが区画を片付けて、士官達はインフェルニに代わる新たな修理クルーを編成中です。船の重要なシステムは安定し、御身の玉座は解放されました。数千もの王朝の人民が、ご命令をお待ちしているのですから、あとはあとは陛下が船長の座に就き、その支配を宣言なさるだけでいいのです。フォン・ヴァランシウス家万歳！」
languages.original_text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. Thousands of dynasty subjects are waiting for your orders, so all that remains is for you to take the captain's throne and affirm your dominion. All hail House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: 「あれが最後のひと絞りの抵抗で、反乱は鎮圧されました、ロード・キャプテン。エンフォーサーが区画を片付けて、士官達はインフェルニに代わる新たな修理クルーを編成中です。船の重要なシステムは安定し、御身の玉座は解放されました。数千もの王朝の人民が、ご命令をお待ちしているのですから、あとはあとは陛下が船長の座に就き、その支配を宣言なさるだけでいいのです。フォン・ヴァランシウス家万歳！」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “刚刚那些人就是最后的叛军了。我们已经镇压了这场叛乱，舰长大人。目前执法者正在对船舱进行清洗，军官也在忙着组建新的维修团队，取代原来那些人。这艘船的所有关键系统都已经正常运转，我们也重新夺回了您的舰长宝座，王朝无数臣民都在等待着您的命令。您只需要重新登上宝座，让所有人看到您的权威即可。荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”
languages.original_text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. Thousands of dynasty subjects are waiting for your orders, so all that remains is for you to take the captain's throne and affirm your dominion. All hail House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: “刚刚那些人就是最后的叛军了。我们已经镇压了这场叛乱，舰长大人。目前执法者正在对船舱进行清洗，军官也在忙着组建新的维修团队，取代原来那些人。这艘船的所有关键系统都已经正常运转，我们也重新夺回了您的舰长宝座，王朝无数臣民都在等待着您的命令。您只需要重新登上宝座，让所有人看到您的权威即可。荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Das war die letzte Widerstandszelle ... die Meuterei wurde niedergeschlagen, Lord Captain. Die Enforcer säubern jetzt die Module, und die Offiziere bilden neue Reparaturcrews, um die Inferni zu ersetzen. Die kritischen Systeme des Schiffs wurden stabilisiert und Euer Thron wurde befreit. Tausende von Untertanen der Dynastie erwarten Eure Befehle. Ihr müsst also nur noch den Thron des Captains besteigen und Eure Herrschaft bestätigen. Gepriesen sei das Haus von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. Thousands of dynasty subjects are waiting for your orders, so all that remains is for you to take the captain's throne and affirm your dominion. All hail House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Das war die letzte Widerstandszelle ... die Meuterei wurde niedergeschlagen, Lord Captain. Die Enforcer säubern jetzt die Module, und die Offiziere bilden neue Reparaturcrews, um die Inferni zu ersetzen. Die kritischen Systeme des Schiffs wurden stabilisiert und Euer Thron wurde befreit. Tausende von Untertanen der Dynastie erwarten Eure Befehle. Ihr müsst also nur noch den Thron des Captains besteigen und Eure Herrschaft bestätigen. Gepriesen sei das Haus von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « C'était la dernière poche de résistance. La mutinerie a été réprimée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les prévôts inspectent actuellement tous les compartiments, et les officiers forment de nouvelles équipes de réparation pour remplacer les inferni. Les systèmes essentiels du vaisseau ont été stabilisés, et votre trône a été libéré. Les milliers de sujets qui peuplent votre dynastie attendent vos ordres, et il ne vous reste plus qu'à prendre place sur votre siège de pouvoir afin d'asseoir votre domination. Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. Thousands of dynasty subjects are waiting for your orders, so all that remains is for you to take the captain's throne and affirm your dominion. All hail House von Valancius!"

Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Bu son direniş gücüydü. İsyan bastırıldı Lord Kaptan. İnfazcılar şu an kompartımanlarda temizlik yapıyor, subaylar da itfacıların yerini alacak onarım mürettebatlarını oluşturuyor. Geminin kritik sistemleri stabilize edildi ve tahtınız kurtarıldı. Binlerce hanedanlık tebaası emirlerinizi bekliyor. Tek yapmanız gereken, kaptan tahtındaki yerinizi almak ve başta olduğunuzu göstermek. Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: "That was the last pocket of resistance — the mutiny has been suppressed, Lord Captain. The enforcers are now carrying out a sweep of the compartments, and the officers are forming new repair crews to replace the inferni. The ship's critical systems have been stabilised, and your throne has been liberated. Thousands of dynasty subjects are waiting for your orders, so all that remains is for you to take the captain's throne and affirm your dominion. All hail House von Valancius!"
